title: Sad Stories of Baby Loss at a Hospital
summary: This article tells a sad story about some families who lost their babies at a hospital in Sussex, England. The families were excited to have their first babies, but something went wrong. Two couples even planned to name their sons Felix. An investigation found that the hospital might not have taken good care of these families. The hospital paid a lot of money for mistakes in maternity care. Some parents say the hospital did not tell them the truth about what happened. The hospital says it tries to keep babies safe. This story helps us learn about how hospitals need to be careful and listen to parents.

background_read: This article is about a serious problem in a hospital in England where some babies died. Hospitals are supposed to help families have healthy babies, but sometimes things go wrong. It's important for hospitals to listen to parents and check babies carefully. This story shows why we need to make sure hospitals are safe places for everyone.

WHAT: An investigation found problems with maternity care at the hospital
WHERE: At a hospital in Sussex, England
WHY: To tell people about the sad stories and help make hospitals safer

perspectives.description: Parents are sad and angry because they think the hospital did not help their babies enough.
The hospital says it tries to keep babies safe and has low death rates.
